SELECT inv_billmain.dept_name as "deptName", inv_billmain.work_posname as "workPosname", inv_billmain.bill_date as "billDate",
inv_billdetail.order_num as "orderNum", inv_billdetail.item_code as "itemCode", inv_billdetail.item_name as "itemName", inv_billdetail.item_spec as "itemSpec", inv_billdetail.meas_unit as "measUnit", inv_billdetail.item_qty as "itemQty", inv_billdetail.item_price as "itemPrice", inv_billdetail.item_sum as "itemSum",
inv_billmain.ware_empname as "wareEmpname", inv_billmain.io_type,
inv_billdetail.note as "note", billp.`name` as "billPerson",
sys_user.`name` as "billEmpname" from inv_billmain inner join inv_billdetail on inv_billmain.id = inv_billdetail.bill_num inner join sys_user on sys_user.`no` = inv_billmain.bill_empid inner join sys_user billp on billp.`no` = inv_billmain.bill_person
inv_billmain.io_type like 'CI%'
AND inv_billmain.bill_date BETWEEN #{beginBillDate} AND #{endBillDate}
AND inv_bill_type.dept_name like '%'||#{deptName}||'%' '%'+#{deptName}+'%' concat('%',#{deptName},'%')
AND inv_billmain.work_posname like '%'||#{workPosname}||'%' '%'+#{workPosname}+'%' concat('%',#{workPosname},'%')
AND pur_relations.order_num like '%'||#{orderNum}||'%' '%'+#{orderNum}+'%' concat('%',#{orderNum},'%')
AND inv_billdetail.item_name like '%'||#{itemName}||'%' '%'+#{itemName}+'%' concat('%',#{itemName},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
